Our group focus on climate change and urban resilience, mainly on Hong Kong, the historical prosperous harbour city as the world financial center which is located in Southern China. 

Group member: Hang Zhao, George Chen, Ling Chen

This site is our final project site showing several exploratory analysis, raster data processing, big data analysis, and clustering, which is part of the final project for [MUSA 550](https://musa-550-fall-2023.github.io/), during fall 2023.
